outline:
1. to arise, stand
    1. (P'al)
      1. to arise from
      2. to come on the scene (fig)
      3. to arise (out of inaction)
      4. to stand
      5. to endure
    2. (Pael) to set up, establish
    3. (Aphel)
      1. to set up
      2. to lift up
      3. to establish
      4. to appoint
    4. (Hophal) to be made to stand
kjv_def: appoint, establish, make, raise up self, (a-) rise (up), (make to) stand, set (up).
strongs_def: {to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)}
